website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, fun, and versatile: great for all terrain conditions and any sort of weather.
pros: Strong aluminum frame and good build quality throughout
Reliable 300W motor with six speeds for better energy management
Four-inch tires give exceptional grip in snow, sand, and mud
cons: Customers occasionally mention minor quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: Good Ebike value.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. Assembly was easy. Front and rear brake controls were reversed, so first time my son rode it and did his typical mountain bike maneuver of sliding the back wheel around to a stop, it braked the front wheel instead and he went flying! So just be warned to take note. I do wish the LCD display would show Mph instead of Kph. Having trouble with flat tires on both of my fat tire bikes so am ordering liners and heavy-duty innertubes . We live in the high desert and go off road.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Garwood

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price, well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Fat tire cruiser model: Over 1000 miles in, gets my 230lb self about 15 miles of throttle only, could stretch it to 20 if I pedal assisted. It’s heavy, but really sturdy and works ok with no battery or charge. The fat tires are nice but I needed to get liners because I was running over nails a little too frequently. If I had to complain about something it’s the brakes. They are loud and need to be tightened every 150 miles or so.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service. Low quality bike...changed my review
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! I like the design I'll order more in the future! -Pros Strong bike big and tough nice styling good battery good customer support -Cons lot of noise vibrations bad pedal modulation No Shocks! Almost broke my arm... bad brakes loud brakes no rear shocks kick stand is plastic slips and breaks chains pop off way to easily create brackets around them Suggestions -please sell upgrade parts on the website like shocks and make the bike smart with apps thanks company shipping is fast! But they send the wrong parts! I recommend spending the money on a better company if you want your return on investment! Improve repairability.
customer_reviews.author: GameHEADtime

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a first Ebike, or one to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: You can't use the tools that come with the bike to put the bike together. None of the tools were the right size or type. The tools needed are fairly common, so that wasn't a huge deal, Just thought I'd share my experience. The fenders, and tire materials are kind of cheap. Mine has no shocks, so it's very stiff riding. The instructions were not helpful in putting the bike together. However, once I got it together, and figured out, the bike was a lot of fun riding. I will be adding better tires though because the ones that came with it are quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: James Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality ebikes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an ebike through Epicord official shop. The bike is high quality, affordable and reliable. The customer service is great and fast response. If you’re looking for an ebike, this is the dealer you should purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: sanghort

customer_reviews.title: the wheels that are not 4"
customer_reviews.text: well i like the bike but not happy about the size of the wheels. you order a fat tire bike that is supposed to be a 4" wheel but its only got a 3 1/4"wheel with a 4" tire. i have other fat tire bikes and they came with 4" wheels but when you pay that much for a bike you suspect what you pay for. Which is a 4" wheels
customer_reviews.author: Donnie  Kroush

customer_reviews.title: Highly  recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great e bike rides great fun and looks like very high end bike. The tires are only problem , riding in sand at Borrego both tires went flat from stickers mixed in the sand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Got it to just ride to work and great bike no trouble going up hills and gets pretty good speed
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Bad Forks
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even get bike assembled before we noticed the forks are about 2” out of square The tire won’t even think about going on We put one side on and the other side is missing by 2” hopefully someone takes care of this It took us 2 months to get the bike
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best ebikes for under 1k. Very sturdy and fun to drive and looks great. I put over 200 miles within a few weeks and the only issue I've had so far were flat tires (3 in less than two weeks) I had liners installed and problem solved. Handle bars are a bit uncomfortable so I plan to upgrade them. Takes two months to arrive but it was worth the wait. Recommend you take it to a local shop to adjust brakes etc.
customer_reviews.author: xCacaSecax

customer_reviews.title: Good long as there are no problems
customer_reviews.text: Great bike just as long as it's running smooth. Next to impossible to find anyone who will work on it..having to learn how to fix it myself which is not ok.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Powell

customer_reviews.title: Wtf!
customer_reviews.text: It finally showed up after being more than two months late and one of the bearings on the neck is broken
customer_reviews.author: Nathan m.

customer_reviews.title: love the bike
customer_reviews.text: owners manual not for this bike screws missing for parts
customer_reviews.author: John kokenge

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box, needed outside repair
customer_reviews.text: The bike came with a vague instruction sheet and an instruction booklet booklet for an entirely different model. Additionally the front brake disc assembly did not function and needed professional outside repair.
customer_reviews.author: matthew c dunn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. I"m really happy with the purchase. If you like a longer ride i would suggest getting the 500w. Please try to remember to check all bolts and screws before you ride. Especially the crank. Parts were loose. Overall im very happy with purchase. Expect to wait at least one month for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: joseph b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ride
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to return this item I am able to rate it because I purchased one already. This ebike is awesome and worth every penny. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Uptown gurlz

customer_reviews.title: Solid ride
customer_reviews.text: After some difficulty with shipping I received my bike and it has been quite a fun ride . So far 180 miles and no major problems. Seems to be a solid bike for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazonslave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build.. performer!
customer_reviews.text: The Nakto is a well built and has been very pleasurable to ride.. primarily for pleasure.. The ride time and distance has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JasCar

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bike that is fun to ride.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is a lot of fun to ride! It has peddle assist which helps you go up hills. We had some issues with the chain and took a few hours to get it working correctly but overall we are happy with it. Have to say we have only used it once. However planning to use it a lot on a trip soon. If opinion changes we will update our comments.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Huebner

customer_reviews.title: i dont' like it almost fell.
customer_reviews.text: is to big. is not for me.i would like to exchange, whit NATKO 24 inch. thanks
customer_reviews.author: please send me this dvd

customer_reviews.title: If you like a nice bike ride on steroids 💪
customer_reviews.text: Took sometime to get here. But worth every minute of it! Thanks Nakto
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: No shocks, chain falls off incredibly easily, fork arrived bent and had to pay to fix it, didnt answer email about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jyllian Smolev

customer_reviews.title: Junk bike, junk customer service
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived 3 weeks late. Then the bike all of a sudden stopped working in the middle of a ride, after only a half dozen rides on it. Their website lists multiple emails to contact them for help, tried all of them, only one person got back to me saying “you need to try a different email contact”...which I did and called their location in Placentia multiple times too, but goes straight to a voicemail, and no one has called back. It has been over a month now with zero customer service and $1k bike just collecting dust in my garage
customer_reviews.author: chelsea l shupe

customer_reviews.title: Worst seller EVER
customer_reviews.text: worst product and seller ever, please don't waste your money and time and looking for another seller, they sold me a defective bike and refused to give me back the full refund. I paid for enabling and they didn't recognize it, again worst, additionally Amazon customer service said that they had nothing to do, so worst experience ever
customer_reviews.author: claudia rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The worst customer service known to mankind!
customer_reviews.text: Nakto and Trek Power are 2 clowns short of a circus period.
customer_reviews.author: Steveand

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The front fork was bent and the front wheel can’t be installed. M asking for refund and now have to get rid of this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Hamed Javadi

customer_reviews.title: Custumer service really unexciting
customer_reviews.text: Custumer service stinks. My battery charger dont work. Nobody answer the phone or respond to e mail. I returning this bike feed up
customer_reviews.author: Georgio

product_meta.title: NAKTO Electric Bike for Adults 26" 300W Electric Bicycle for Man Women High Speed Brushless Gear Motor 6-Speed Gear Speed E-Bike with Removable Waterproof 36V10A Lithium Battery and Charger
product_meta.description:
NAKTO developed this latest style of electric bicycle , whose core concept is green & environmental protection. 
Achieve green living, create a better world for the next generation is our unremitting 

【Electric Bikes Parameter】
Brand：Nakto
Color: Black/White
Configuration level: high version
Motor：36V 250W brushless motor
Output power: 10% increase
Battery：36V 10AH, Seal ‘Detachable’
Charger: US Standard DC Smart Charger (With UL CE CPSC Certification )
Batterycharging time: 4-6hours
Charging current: 2.0A
Battery Life: 500-650 Cycles
Battery indicator: Electric Power Display ( Full, Half and Empty)
Frame: Q345 Carbon Steel Metal Frame + Aluminum Alloy Hub
Rear Gears: High Quality "SHIMANO" 6-Speed-Gears
Braking Device: Front V Brake, Rear Expansion Brake + High-strength Al Alloy Brake Lever
INNER TIRE: CST 26" * 1.90" / 2.215 Tire
Outer Tire: 26" 1.75" Tire Inflate To 280-450KPA(40~65PSI/2.3~4.5 BAR)
Throttle Typ : Variable Speed Control
PAS: Save 70% Energy During Cycling
Speed:: 20 Miles/hour
Mileage: 18-23 miles

【Other parameters】
Seat: ITALY SELLEROYAL RIO
Seat to Ground: 35"~43"
Applicable Crowd HEIGHT: 4.9"~6.6"
MAX Loading：250Lbs
PACKAGE：56*10*30 Inches
NW/GW：57Lbs/70Lbs(with battery)

【FULL SET 】
1 * City Ebike
1 * Battery
1 * Smart Battery Charger
1 * basket
1 * Tool kit 
1 * User's Manual
1 * Warranty Card

【100% 1 YEAR WARRANTY & 7x24h After Sale Service】
NAKTO Promise: The Electric Bikes parts are free for the customers during the quality assurance period. 
NAKTO Electric Bikes warehouse is in California, all products are distributed locally in the US, make sure the fastest delivery, any problem please contact us.
Note：The Warranty and service is limited to all purchases made from NAKTO.
feature_bullets: 【High-quality material】: The electric bicycle adopts high-strength 100% aluminum alloy frame, the front fork is made of high-strength carbon steel, and the 9CM buffer zone has better shock absorption effect. The frame is made of 1.6MM high-quality aluminum alloy and 8 process paints. The double-disc brake system can effectively and smoothly stop the brakes when it is in emergency braking.It adopts 4.0 wide tires and thicker plus，effective shock absorption, to cope with various road conditions.

【Intelligent central control digital LCD display】 : Adopt new intelligent central control digital LCD display, intuitive digital display, power display, electric speed display, 6-speed power display, cruising range display, electric vehicle fault self-discharge display, digital display Let you see at a glance and swim all the way. The powerful and bright night light can be adjusted up and down, the illumination does not hurt the eyes, and the night riding more safer.

【Built-in lithium battery and high-speed motor】: equipped with 36V, 10AH detachable lithium battery, 4Hour fast charging, 2000 cycles of charging, unlocking and fixing, freely retractable; 350W high-speed brush-less and 6-speed gear motor can easily help you Easy to ride at 30 MPH and distance up to 35-45Miles. And configure Plenty custom intelligent vector controller, power off 220V2A charger, intelligent aluminum alloy power brake, aluminum alloy non-slip pedal, good strength and durability.

【Three working modes】: 1.Pure electric bicycle: throttle start is equivalent to portable electric vehicle; 2.Auxiliary bicycle: adopt higher-end 1:1 power assist system (PAS technology), a new type of human-computer interaction technology While riding and assisting, the ride is more labor-saving and comfortable: 3.Bicycle mode: equivalent to the high-end configuration bicycle in the market, making riding effortless. Combine the three modes and choose according to your needs and enjoy cycling.

【7x24H ON-LINE SERVICE & 100% 1 YEAR WARRANTY】：NAKTO Provide 7X24 Hour ON-line Service, NAKTO Team will resolve your trouble if customer have any problem. NAKTO Electric Bikes parts are free for the customers during the quality assurance period, NAKTO Provide best Purchase Experience and Best NAKTO E-bikes Ride Experience!
